lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe in people working in order to lift themselves out of poverty. I am blessed to be able to help them.
lender.occupational_info: Part-time work in a retail store that sells all kinds of craft supplies & wool for knitting.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps!
lender.occupational_info: I work in transportation- specializing in school bus routing and efficiency.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I believe I have been blessed to be a blessing!!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it helps to make change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for a non-profit which provides services to older adults from basic needs such as food and housing to activities and socialization.

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: Love to help the needy ! Thank God for all he has bestowed upon us !
lender.occupational_info: Computer hardware business.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I like the feelings of helping others to help themeselves. Kiva is a perfect concept!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother to a 3 year old boy and a 4 month old baby girl .

lender.name: TERRI
lender.loan_because: I LOAN BECAUSE I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE TO HELP THEMSELVES.
lender.occupational_info: I WORK IN A BAKERY IN A LARGE GROCERY STORE.

lender.name: Jess Meister
lender.loan_because: There is a risk regardless of who you loan to. I loan to foreign countries, because this way I can be sensitive to the world around me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be an overseas chaplain.

lender.name: Silvia and family
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves, i believe that no matter how tough it is sometimes there is always someone else who needs more help.
lender.occupational_info: Just want to get the message out to help someone today and want them to forward the same message to their friends and so on.

lender.name: Rishi
lender.loan_because: A small dollar goes a long way for these people. i'm glad I can help. Contribution to kiva actually reach the ones who needs most, there for I'm excited.
lender.occupational_info: Nothing special about me. I like to help out when ever I can.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in a country were I had opportunities to succeed. Its important that those who weren't as lucky be given opportunities.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I know many people are working very hard to get through life, and I want to support others as I have been fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in psychology supporting people who want to make their mental/emotional/spiritual lives better.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It all starts with 1 person to make a difference, its up to me!!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Japanese company RICOH, I train corporate clients how to use our products, eg. Faxes,copiers,printers etc.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I think a helping hand to others in another country is a small way to contribute to a global feeling of caring, community and may create a climate of goodwill between nations and cultures. Kiva provides an easy way for people to assist others.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: To give a battler a go
lender.occupational_info: Enjoyment of life - keeping fit & spending time with family & friends

lender.name: Alethea
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for what I have and it feels good to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses and blocks of land.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone in this world should help one another if possible.
lender.occupational_info: I help the abandoned and discarded cats, kittens and sometimes dogs find great new homes. I make sure it is a long term committment and a good match for both the animal and the person. =^,,^=

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Until I can help in a big way I want to help in small ways as often as I can.
lender.occupational_info: Anytime a movie, or a television commercial, or a concert, or anything else is shown on TV, a video editor has taken all the footage that was filmed and arranged it into the story you see.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I have visited some poorer countries and I want to help women especially to be able to raise their own income.
lender.occupational_info: I work fo the Australian Government interviewing people and gathering information on how Australians live.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less fortunate than me
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office doing conveyancing - the buying and selling of property

lender.name: Kendall and Anthony
lender.loan_because: to try and make a difference ...

lender.name: Erica
lender.occupational_info: i study insects and how they interact with plants. evolutionary relationships between flowers and beetles interest me particularly.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I dont feel that in this day and age there should be such a thing as poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I go to University where i study teaching and business...I also have 3 jobs to help me get by.

lender.name: Roseyanna
lender.loan_because: I want to give HOPE and help those in need....
lender.occupational_info: I teach people on the finer aspects of customer service and social etiquette.

lender.name: Geremy
lender.occupational_info: Graduant Student

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I wish to keep money flowing between people

lender.name: sam n jazz
lender.loan_because: We support single, divorced and widowed women.

lender.name: Shemika
lender.loan_because: i'm able.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I am delighted to find a way to help others and know that my money is going directly to the person who needs a little help to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Hospital Laboratory as a Medical Laboratory Technician. We provide a 24hr service doing tests that help Doctors to diagnose and treat patients.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: cela nous aide à réaliser des rêves...

lender.name: Jihed&Ahnie
lender.loan_because: I was blessed with enough to share.

lender.name: Marnie
lender.loan_because: I like to help others. I also like to hear about other people's passions.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global company that develops networking technology that helps people across the world stay connected. I manage Programs that help our business partners.

lender.name: Geneva Girls
lender.loan_because: We live in the U.S. and have so many wonderful opportunities available to us. In raising our daughter(s), we hope to instill in them the strong desire to help others knowing that life is about sharing and caring for others. When we adopted our daughter 2005 we noticed that her name was given with "Best Wishes" and "Hope" that she would be happy. We feel that the best way to accomplish this is by giving this to others. The world we live in will be a reflection of what we give from ourselves to others.
lender.occupational_info: By joining forces with other families who have been blessed by adoption, we hope to provide support to women in other parts of the world who could benefit from our help. Women are very fortunate in the U.S. to have so many opportunities to become anything (including business owners). We hope to support women's business in other areas of the world where opportunities do not come so easily. We send "Best Wishes" and "Hope that you are Happy" and successful.

lender.name: Donal
lender.loan_because: This appears to be a simple, low risk, practical approach to helping somebody with real needs.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange long term financing for productive (income earning) projects in developing countries.

lender.name: Arthur Family
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: little things count.
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT.

lender.name: Raquel and Stephen
lender.loan_because: We love to help others.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can, and therefore to do anything less would be wrong
lender.occupational_info: I work for the people of Bolton, England. My job is to use the money that is collected from the people of Bolton in taxes to help support older people who live in Bolton who can not live at home safely. I ask them what help they need to stay safe in their own homes and I then try to give them that help. It may be getting someone to help them wash or dress, or a hot meal delivered every day. Anything that will allow them to live safely at home for as long as possible. PS My dog Pippin says 'Hi!'

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to change someones life

lender.name: Shanlee
lender.loan_because: Just a small amount of money can make such a big difference to someone on the other side of the world who is less fortunate.

lender.name: carlos
lender.loan_because: for so little we all together can do so much difference for them, it's just a great feeling.

lender.name: Terrence
lender.loan_because: i should

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I know that most people are honest and that sometimes a small helping hand can make a big difference, insights learned from being blind and in a wheelchair.
lender.occupational_info: I work on programmes for computers, mostly for small businesses.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe I can make the difference in someones else life and that makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate the access of information

lender.name: Manny
lender.loan_because: I've been there and done that!

lender.name: Tomcat
lender.loan_because: Helping a particular person seems somehow better than just sending money to some faceless charity. And of course, if it gets paid back, we can loan the same money out again.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer. I design gas furnaces for heating of homes.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way! I am a firm believer in microfinance, and Kiva.org offers everyone the opportunity to make a huge difference to a life by empowering individuals to provide for themselves.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a simple solution to a complex problem. Poverty is rarely a natural disaster but a result of inequitable and unjust human social factors. It is within our power to say "people, this is not good enough!". Thanks Kiva for providing such a mechanism and shining a bright light in a darkening world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a counsellor, so people come to me to talk over problems. I help them come to understand what has caused their problems and assist them to discover ways to resolve and prevent these.

lender.name: tracy
lender.loan_because: I can see who Im helping out & it feels good

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I care about the people of Lebanon and want to help, I have been there and feel a connection with the people
lender.occupational_info: I am a waitress and work hard for my money, but feel fortunate that I have a job and can help other people, when i am able

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that children are our future.

lender.name: Sally-Ann
lender.occupation: PhD student, mother of two children
lender.loan_because: it can empower others
lender.occupational_info: I am at university as an older student., studying for my doctorate in psychology. I admire women that can take a stand and help their families by helping themselves.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: It is one small way to share the bounty we enjoy in this country and a way of letting people know the true "American spirit"
lender.occupational_info: I am an investigative TV reporter in the city of Atlanta, Georgia.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs economic help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: Owner and manager of a yoga and massage studio.

lender.name: Claudia and Martin
lender.loan_because: I know that this is something small that we can do to make a big difference in the livelihood of another person/family.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great program, an awesome opportunity to contribute. :)

lender.name: Mikael
lender.loan_because: It´s a privilege to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: Making people outstanding!

lender.name: NickG
lender.loan_because: I believe that everybody deserves equal oppurtunities. I have been fortunate and it's only fair to spread that good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I'm training and learning with a view to offer a counselling service to communities in need of psychological services in my homeland, South Africa.

lender.name: Ronda
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner in the United States, I understand the struggle and can appreciate the hard work of being a small business owner. I would like very much to help someone achieve their dream!
lender.occupational_info: My family and I own a construction company.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to achieve their goals and give something back.

lender.name: Lizzie
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and want to help others who are working to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a choir director and voice teacher, retired now from teaching junior high choirs.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I love business and making things successful. We all live in a global village that is becoming more interconnected.
lender.occupational_info: As a marketing executive, I help companies sell more products and be more profitable by expanding peoples' awareness of their products/services.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I receive great pleasure from assisting people to step into their personal power and reap rewards for their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired nurse and counselor.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: This is a personal extension of the credit union philosophy of "People Helping People."
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Credit Union, which is a non-profit financial cooperative.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: the world would be a better place if everyone helped each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Executive Assistant to a CEO of a large company. I am now enjoying my retirement and feel blessed that I was able to retire and now travel and enjoy the rest of my life.

lender.name: Monica
lender.occupation: run a non-profit business women\'s group

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want people around the world to know that Americans care about their welfare and want to share our freedom and prosperity with all.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and manage websites for my city's economic development and tourism agencies.

lender.name: The Allyn Family
lender.loan_because: I want my children to understand that simple actions can make a great impact and that they are not too small to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help my children to become the best adults they can possibly be.

lender.name: Kathie/Tyler
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Capturing the spoken word and recording it for posterity.

lender.name: Marianna
lender.loan_because: I want to give a hand up to someone rather than a hand out. Someone once helped me and my children, now it is my turn.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from accounting but work at a recreational company by serving others at dances, movies, concerts, etc.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I want to help people out of poverty.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help others. To quote Deepak Chopra, "Money is like blood, it must flow." May these small contributions lead to waves of prosperity throughout the world.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to be sucessful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager in a company that repairs ships.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I am lucky and have enough for myself and my family.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company hiring people to work, training staff and helping managers understand the needs of their staff.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the right to make a decent life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a designer-maker and artist. I design all sorts of crazy rubbish!

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: It is important to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because:
There are so many things that I take for granted....my health, my wealth, my education....It's time to help those who can help themselves....
I loan because I can...and it is the right thing to do...

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs for several small weekly newspapers in the Chicago area.

lender.name: CBH
lender.loan_because: It is a good use of my money.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: where we are born is an accident of birth. I believe I should use what chance has given me to enrich the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I study Finance and History at the University of Florida.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Its a small amount which put together with everyone elses will really make an impact. This site is a great idea.

lender.name: HUGH C.
lender.loan_because: this just struck me as the right thing to do. Such a simple concept that really works. We have so much,,,they have so little.
lender.occupational_info: Just trying to do my share.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Lynsey
lender.loan_because: There's no excuse not to!

lender.name: Oma & Elo
lender.loan_because: I heard an excellent interview with a Kiva spokeswoman on CBC. I was convinced this was something I should do, so I did.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I now live in Oregon, where I spend a lot of time with my grandson, garden, volunteer at my local library, and take care of my cat.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I get a big reward personally. There's something to be said in this world when you help others you feel good about yourself!
lender.occupational_info: Helping buyers and sellers through the complex web of real estate, especially in this market today. I can help "make it happen" for them.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I direct a year round indoor swim school. I lead and manage over 20 employees. It's a fun and fulfilling job!

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a good job and some extra money. I especially like this idea because it is not charity but helping someone to help themselves.

lender.name: Cardinal Stritch
lender.loan_because: we wish to create a caring community locally, nationally and internationally

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good knowing that I have helped someone to improve their life and living conditions.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I think its a good way to help others get on there feet, i think all small things do help
lender.occupational_info: I am now semi-retired and just relaxing and have a good time.

lender.name: Cathy & David
lender.loan_because: We feel that every woman should have the opportunity to better themselves and support their children through hard work and initiative.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: My work takes me to Africa frequently. I meet wonderful people, in beautiful countries, who are in great need of our support.
lender.occupational_info: Scientific research consultant for African documentaries.

lender.name: Sharondale
lender.loan_because: I believe that 1 person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students about how society works and how to change things to make society better.

lender.name: Abel
lender.loan_because: I want to share what God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: Ministry

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to bless others. I am trying to learn what community really is and to do my part to establish relationships and aid in times of need.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am fortunate enough not to work as I complete my studies. I will be graduating from college in December of 2007.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the programme and I believe in helping people in other nations. I'm pleased with my personal situation and believe that when you have so much in terms of privilege that its your duty to help others. I am constantly telling my students to make a difference and this is one way I can do that. I love the concept of letting people help themselves as well. I think it shows them that we're not being paternalistic and that we are giving people credit for their own intelligence and initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English, History and Political Sciences at the secondary (high school) level.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I like the personal connection with the person I'm lending to. I like to know who and where the money is going and for what purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I do home visits with new Moms and babies to help them get off to a good start together.

lender.name: Cherie Maher
lender.loan_because: I feel that we should all give a little to others who really need to advance their lives or just to survive. I loan because i wish there was no suffering in the world and giving is the greatest gift in life.
lender.occupational_info: I educate the community about pest species that arrive in our country through different means of transport. I educate them on how they can help to prevent them from spreading and how the pests can damage our environment and wildlife

lender.name: Lianne
lender.loan_because: because i want to see people move forward and know that in some small way i am making a difference
lender.occupational_info: i am a single mother of 3 children and am currently studying at university to better our lives and our future

lender.name: Kyley
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to be born in a great place like Canada where oppurtunities and school are everywhere. I think everyone deserves the chance.
lender.occupational_info: I really want to become a nurse, specifically with baby deliveries so right now its lockdown time with studying and working to pay for school!

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Lots of little changes build up to a great big difference : 0 )

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: It's a simple way to help someone else.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that don't know computers to use theirs...

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a first year law student at Emory University in Atlanta, GA.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I do believe in the adage "teach a person to fish" and I see this loan doing that for someone.
lender.occupational_info: Retired now but as a financial auditor teaching accounting systems was my emphasis.

lender.name: Sean & Tiffany
lender.loan_because: We believe that micro credit is the key to helping people out of poverty through the power of their own motivation.

lender.name: Lona
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a more secure place by helping people individually become more secure.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise teachers of English, social studies, and Spanish. Some of the social studies students in my school helped pick the people to whom I lend. This helps the students understand other parts of the world and have a connection to people outside their range of experience.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Small private businesses create more prosperity for families than any other system.
lender.occupational_info: I create software that allows computers to communicate with each other.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: life is hard, the least we can do is help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I study the animals that lived on earth millions of years ago... well right now I tell people who come to the museum about them

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: Seeing the recipients of my loans adds a personal dimension and sense of knowing exactly where and to whom the funding goes.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am human. You are human. We are brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise funds to manufacture wheelchairs that we distribute for free to the poorest of the poor across the world. www.FreeWheelchairMission.com

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kevin & Cindy
lender.loan_because: We can't help ourselves from wanting to help. These loans are the most meaningful expense of the month.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune of having had so many opportunities in my life
lender.occupational_info: Teaching

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: sharing is one of the great joys in life. I am lucky enough to be able to lend and still keep the lights on and the tuition paid.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed, like the people to whom I lend. I have a wonderful husband and two fabulous sons.

lender.name: AHK & SAK
lender.loan_because: we are lucky.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a public school teacher. I write educational materials. We work for the future by working in education.

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: I care about those who are so close to loosing the game of Life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Fiona and Scott
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed and want to share with others to help them on their life's journey. We are all precious in God's eyes.

lender.name: Amber and Hunter
lender.loan_because: Because if you have everyting you want it is good to then give to others to help them get what they want!!!
lender.occupational_info: We are high school students

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I've been given so much in my life - it's time to pay back.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for 30 years in the technology business. I was lucky enough to travel to many countries. I am now retired with a focus on doing good with what I have.

lender.name: Alice and friends
lender.loan_because: We want to help others.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: if I can help improve someone else's life, my life is also improved by knowing that I am lucky enough to be able to share.

lender.name: Xhetan Aliu
lender.loan_because: If we all help a little, the world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: IT Management

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Glyn and Marley
lender.occupational_info: Glyn creates artwork by computer software for clothing. Marley handles credit claims for a large company.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: sometimes people need a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I read and study ridiculous amounts for school and wipe down tables in a restaurant.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I think everybody should have the same opportunity that I have to better their lives. I think loans are better than just giving money because it helps people feel better about themselves, more empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist working in hot glass. I sell my work at art fairs around the United States.

lender.name: Chuck G
lender.loan_because: I know how tough it is to run a small business and am grateful for the loans that i have received. I thought i would use some of my loans to help some others get a step up.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a wholesale and retail business focussed on the avalanche safety business.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I would like to help those less fortunate than me obtain a measure of financial independence.

lender.name: LepusReg
lender.loan_because: I want to see disadvantaged people succeed in life!
lender.occupational_info: I farm (raise organic beef, chicken, ducks and geese) and also raise and train hunting dogs.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help the forest grow back

lender.name: Jason and Emily
lender.occupational_info: Emily operates an artificial heart and lung during heart surgery.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: Other people have it much tougher than me, so I want to help them out.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard and it pays off, I am a straight A student!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe microcredit is changing the world and am absolutely blessed to have the opportunity to participate in it

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: there is always someone who needs the money more than I do

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: adequate funding, along with these peoples' ideas and drive, will improve both their lives and everyone else that they "touch".
lender.occupational_info: Our firm provides finance, accounting, income tax and general management services for start-up companies.

lender.name: Staff of VGRS
lender.loan_because: I fundraise at work to raise money for charity. Staff from our workplace, VGRS, are avid supporters. I give Kiva about a third of the total amount raised over the year. Other charities receive the rest.
lender.occupational_info: VGRS is the Victorian Government Reporting Service in Victoria, Australia. We have a total of about 90 staff members who create, archive and distribute court transcript.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering women makes a difference to peace.
lender.occupational_info: Another Mother

lender.name: MaryAnne
lender.loan_because: Of the impact it can make. Something so small can make huge change. I hope that this small gesture will flow to others.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to do something interesting and useful with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student in Prince George, British Columbia, Canada.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: it feels so good to help others - it gives me a chance to pay forward what I've been given
lender.occupational_info: I find books for people and have the books shipped to them. Customers pay me for the cost of the book and the shipping charge. I also sell my own inventory of out-of-print books online at my webpage and other sites.

lender.name: Robbie & Joe
lender.loan_because: We live in a very small world.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work on large IT projects.

lender.name: IFA
lender.occupational_info: We are a school based club with an interest in promoting global citizenship.

lender.name: Shoshanna
lender.loan_because: I know even a small amount can make a difference.

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: I can. You should too.

lender.name: Hilda
lender.loan_because: There are a lot of needy people around the world. It is our duty to help them; if we can.
lender.occupational_info: I LOVE to travel, going to concerts and going to museums. In my work I teach English to spanish speaking children and translate the letters from English to Spanish for the parents in the school who don't know English.

lender.name: raj
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have an opportunity to do something in this world.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people with mental/physical difficulties to live a normal life.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: This is one of the most participatory and appropriate forms of assistance you can offer someone. I believe it avoids corruption and waste far better than other forms of aid.
lender.occupational_info: I run a solar energy company called Greenskies Renewable Energy

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It sets a good example for others. I plan on using my future lending as a inspiration for the kids that I teach. A little bit of giving can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language in Taiwan.

lender.name: CareLoan
lender.loan_because: These loans allow hardworking individuals to truly lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Our goal is to become one of Kiva.org's largest single lenders. Through your donations, via PayPal, we will create an invaluable resource for the microlending community. We will lend our funds again and again multiplying the effects of even the smallest donation. Getting involved is easy! You can visit our site and follow us on Twitter @CareLoan.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to reward hardworking people and learn about their lives.
lender.occupational_info: People pay me to give them advice when they are sad or worried or having problems in their marriage or want help to know how to raise their children.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I love to be able to help entrepreneurs across the world to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and merchandise products for a large American retailer.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Edmund Burke Quote "nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little". See what happens when many of us contribute a little . . . .
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the administration and accounts of a Motor Vehicle Body Repair Shop.

lender.name: Chloe
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of microloans because they make it possible to break the cycle. We're not patronizing people, rather we're giving them the opportunity to lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: with this small commitment, I wish to bring hope and opportunity to someone else. Once there is hope, all our lives are better for it.

lender.name: Bec
lender.loan_because: a small loan from me is a huge deal to these people. Every little bit of help makes a difference.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: It is appropriate to give back to others less fortunate than myself

lender.name: Brad & Tara
lender.loan_because: it's more than just a donation.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: In loving memory of a precious baby girl "Ebony Clare"

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I sometimes take for granted how lucky I have been and we need to share. Thank you for making it possible for me to do this!

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I believe that world peace is possible. If people help each other help themselves, then it's like teaching them to fish.

lender.name: Allister
lender.loan_because: I have to. I have a good life. I want to share that.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to fix things. How to use the information and tools that are available to them to get a job done.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I love learning about people and their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I make jewelry!

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: It's hard to be under the thumb of interest payments.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Occupational Therapist. I help people regain or learn skills they need for daily life activies. Currently I am working in a pre-school with children who need help learning how to write and I also work in a Hospital with children who need special wheelchairs.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I believe in one person, on either end of this exchange, making a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design systems, buildings, manufacturing lines, jobs and other things to be safer and more productive.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: If you dream big...you should get a chance to chase it.

lender.name: Niky
lender.loan_because: a small amount can make such a big difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I have limited means to do so and Kiva lets me combine my loan with others to help someone out.
lender.occupational_info: I help a municipal water provider conduct environmental impact studies using aerial and satellite imagery.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: If we change the way we see materialism, then we will be more giving to those in need. The luxury of our income should be shared with the poor.
lender.occupational_info: Yoga is the journey of finding your true potential and pure light. Youth Probation is the journey of helping others find theirs.

lender.name: Kym-Maree
lender.occupation: Office Administration - Self Employed. Glazing Com

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to support free enterprise and help people build their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I provide software and training to architects and builders.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: The idea that someone could really change there lives with money sent from me and others really does make the world a smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: Once you have a income I help people make the most efficent use of the money they make.

lender.name: Nina Jean
lender.loan_because: I can. Its' the least that I can do and (for selfish reasons) it makes me feel great!
lender.occupational_info: I make objects that have no real purpose except to look interesting and often they make people smile. I love what I do. It makes me smile too!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: change happens from the collective efforts of individuals.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to fulfill their potential.
lender.occupational_info: Stay at home mother of 2 young children.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: ..because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in intercultural communications.

lender.name: Heather Walter
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to people and places I may never meet or visit, but still have a positive impact on.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I like to give people a helping hand if I can, and this is something I can do to help other women. This in turn helps children, and the whole community. Being self employed gives women confidence and allows them to explore their capabilities. It shows their children that they can do anything they want with their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, supporting my husband who is self employed.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i'm an acountant at my mothers firm

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.occupational_info: I look after children in their home, while their parents go to work.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Martijn
lender.loan_because: It's a good direct way to help people get their business off the ground in difficult enviroments

lender.name: federex
lender.loan_because: i want to start my own internet cafe business. since it is popular here in our place and i want to support my family with it.
lender.occupational_info: having an internet cafe will help people here in our place to communicate with their relatives on other countries. thats why i want to take this opportunity because most of our neighbors have a relatives outside of our country

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It is right to do so. I feel empowered to be able to choose who I loan to.
lender.occupational_info: The land knows how it wants to be treated and what it needs to be healed. By opening I hear the whispers and relay the messages to stewards of the land.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky and blessed in life and its important to spread that around :)!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer (mostly philosophy and fictional crime with a strong emphasis in psychology) and a musician (voice, oboe, piano & clarinet). I also coach Speech & Debate at one of our local high schools.

lender.name: Anca
lender.occupation: doctor dentist disabled professional retired medic

lender.name: Richard & Jenny
lender.loan_because: We know that lending money helps people who want to improve their family income.
lender.occupational_info: We do three different things. Richard works with computers. We care for people with disabilities. We trade shares on the stock market.

lender.name: SRI ENY
lender.loan_because: I am Eny from Bali Indonesia. I am make handycraft products,which reflects the culture and heritage of Java and Bali. I need financial help to make my bussiness viable
lender.occupational_info: I made products at java island,and take to bali for sale the products

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I was so lucky to have been born in this country where I have had every opportunity to learn every skill that I wanted to learn and to become what I desired. I believe everyone should have opportunities to improve their lives, especially women in developing countries without the "protection" of men. This era of self-sufficiency and "equal" rights for women in America, is arguably the most free and self-determined period for women in recorded history. I feel very fortunate to be able to take full advantage of these rights and to extend them to other women in developing countries, as well.
lender.occupational_info: I taught Psychology at an Historically Black University (HBCU) for 25 yrs and then became the planning, research, and grants vice pres at a state minority institution (MI).

lender.name: Leonie
lender.loan_because: The power in having is being able to give

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: The circle of Karma

lender.name: Kaden & Tayla
lender.loan_because: I love helping others.....

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can. Microloans are great. The internet makes such a good thing possible.

lender.name: Jacky
lender.loan_because: I love that such a small amount of money can do so much.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology and help to bridge the gap between technical and business teams. I'm also the mother of 2 fabulous boys and I strive to be a good example to them every day.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share

lender.name: Suzannah
lender.loan_because: I can - I wish to make a difference in the life of somebody less fortunate than myself. I love this opportunity to empower people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a catering business which primarily operates at festivals. I am presently studying towards a masters degree in applied social science (counselling) and mind/body medicine for ourselves and the planet

lender.name: Cesar Campos
lender.loan_because: There isn't a better feeling than to have the opportunity to help someone that is not so privileged to achieve their goals. "It is better to give, than it is to receive!"
lender.occupational_info: I'm an avid freelance writer, Internet and SEO marketer. I also enjoy offering small business and online business advice within the home based business sector.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in a small way to entrepeneurs that I can relate to via this site. I have lived in Africa, worked in the Middle East, have a French husband and my father now lives in Indonesia, so I have a strong transcultural interest!
lender.occupational_info: I educate nurses at a university in Southern England.

lender.name: Nikos
lender.loan_because: I see lending from somebody that can give to somebody that temporarily need as something that helps everybody ...
lender.occupational_info: Web Developer

lender.name: Moustapha and Rana
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Moustapha is a Research scientist and Rana is Senior Health administrator at foreign embassy in Washington DC.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I really appreciate the KIVA organization and find the direct impact these funds have on the lives of the borrowers, their families and their surrounding community is truly amazing. It's also a great opportunity for us to teach our kids about geography, other cultures and the issues that people face in developing countries that we might take for granted.
lender.occupational_info:
Personally, I enjoy spending time and traveling with family, sailing (yes you can sail in Kansas), coaching soccer and learning new things.
Professionally, I help successful people make smart decisions with their money.

lender.name: Ren
lender.loan_because: The service we render others is the rent we pay for our room on earth. -Wilfred Grenfell
lender.occupational_info: I work in policy and corporate social responsibility for pension funds.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Grandpa gave me a gift card and it's (kiva) an awesome idea.
lender.occupational_info: I bug mom until her hair goes gray.

lender.name: Kenneth & Sherry
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: Right now Ken works for an electric company and I stay at home and do volunteer work. He will soon be leaving his job but may find part time job.

lender.name: JoAnne
lender.loan_because: I have 125 students in my 8th grade social studies classes, and each student donated money so we could make loans to 5 different businesses. It is my hope that they understand we are all part of one world, and that they find satisfaction from helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach U.S. history to 8th grade (13 and 14 year old) students.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of women and the more this becomes a reality, the better this world will be.

lender.name: C.H. Low
lender.loan_because: I hope the people I can help will forever be able to keep improving their lives hereafter by their own effort; and they can pay forward to others in return lifting their community as a whole. Give a person a fish, they eat for a day. Give a person the ability to fish, they eat forever!
lender.occupational_info: I have been a CEO/CTO/EVP Product Management in 7+ startup and early stage software and Internet SaaS companies.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: Giving a small amount of money can make a big difference to someone else.

lender.name: Jim & Syndie best
lender.loan_because: little way to make world a better place

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to take a positive step, no matter how small it feels, toward eliminating poverty. I've always felt too small to make a difference but after I discovered this website, I realized that it creates an opportunity for lots of individuals to make big changes in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help local, state, and Federal government agencies exercise and update their emergency response plans.

lender.name: Blake
lender.occupation: Student at The University of Texas

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to give back
lender.occupational_info: I run the office for 3 restaurants and do all the paperwork involved with running a retail business

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Traditional charities have taken too much money and done too little and I believe in the adage "Give a person a fish and you feed him for a day, teach them to fish and you feed them for life".

lender.name: Richard, Christine, K
lender.loan_because: it is helping the poorest of the poor

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start your own business. I started mine during the toughest market conditions, but that pales in comparison to your hardships. It would give me great pleasure to see you succeed. Work hard and believe in yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stock market analyst and I specialize in product called options. I write a number of newsletters that provide trading ideas and education to other option traders. This activity is very much like starting your own business.

lender.name: Laura and her boys
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand. None of us got to where we are by ourselves. We all have had someone, a parent, a teacher, a friend, that gave of themselves to benefit us. When we help each other, we build a stronger and happier community / world. When we work together, magnificent things are accomplished.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time photographer & mom of 2 boys (ages 8 & 10). I am also very involved with my son’s school, sports activities, Cub Scout Pack and Toastmasters International where I volunteer my time.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to to read and make music in a public school.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: independent entrepreneurs are amazing people.

lender.name: James Warren
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way
lender.occupational_info: University lecturer and administrator

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other. - George Eliot
lender.occupational_info: I used to work at a university and teach people how to use computers. Now I teach kids how to grow vegetables and volunteer with the Special Olympics http://www.sotx.org/

lender.name: Mac
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to substitute traditional donations and to support people in poor parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to use the Internet for their businesses and private use.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become successful through my small efforts.
lender.occupational_info: My team prepares documents so that my company can loan money to other businesses who buy our equipment.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe so strongly in empowering those who are already making a difference in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work in client service for an international marketing agency.

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: It makes good economic sense, and fits with ideals derived from my religious upbringing.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying history at the graduate level.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Destinee
lender.loan_because: Helping others makes me have this great feeling inside. Seeing other people happy for my actions is the best feeling in the world. If we want peace on this earth, i really think this program could help. I hope others learn about this because we can change alot in this world if we do simple programs like this. =]
lender.occupational_info: Im in highschool. That means over 7 hours of school each day. After school, I play soccer with a team for 2 hours. I sometimes do a paper route, (I give people newspaper) and get money from that.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: it feels good
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and draw and paint pictures

lender.name: Alanna
lender.loan_because: every little bit matters

lender.name: Jan
lender.occupation: retired teacher now running a small business
lender.loan_because: it costs so little and is so effective. It's also nice to know where the loan is going and what it's purpose is.
lender.occupational_info: For 30 years I was an elementary school teacher. Now my husband and I run our own business inspecting houses for people before they buy.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe that , "To those that much has been given, much is expected."
lender.occupational_info: I work building and maintaining computer and communication networks.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity who otherwise may not have one.
lender.occupational_info: I help my team become a world-class organization.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I don't have much as I am a full time student, but I feel like if I can make any difference at all, it will be worth it.

lender.name: gary
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupational_info: Business education for rural entrepreneurs helps them make better decisions and be more successful with their borrowed money.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: It's easy and I wish I had had this option when I needed just a bit to get by on.

lender.name: A & B
lender.loan_because: People need assistance and it makes us feel good. Help others help themselves!

lender.name: Karthik
lender.loan_because: I ant to make a positive difference in people's life who need that most.
lender.occupational_info: I am a strongly data-driven management consultant advising private equity firms and corporate clients on management and marketing strategy, pricing and brand strategy.

lender.name: Anju
lender.loan_because: There are many out there that need help and the thought that I can make a small transaction with the push of a button, and change someones life for the better, is mind blowing~ Thank you Kiva for providing this service!
lender.occupational_info: I am helping the world be more green with our paperless software solution!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving back to fellow entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I promote products, programs and resources that uplift and inspire people to be their best.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because:
I know that it could be me on the other side asking for a loan. I was born in Guatemala and was lucky enough to grow up in America where my life drastically changed. When I go back and visit my family, though not all are poor, I wonder what my life could have turned out to be.
I loan because I know that this gives people an opportunity to pursue a passion, or a chance to live life and hopefully to truly enjoy it instead of just getting by.
I loan for the hope I have in humanity.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: We may not change the world, but we can make a difference in one person's life with $25.
lender.occupational_info: I will be leaving the Army soon because we do more harm than good in the world.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because:
When you give to others the feeling you get back is fantastic!
I grew up on a grain and cattle farm in Saskatchewan, Canada. I know the impact even one piece of livestock can make to a family; I choose to support livestock and agricultural enterprises.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a communications company as a writer and problem solver.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.occupational_info: Keeping people healthy

lender.name: Elaina
lender.loan_because: People who don't have a dream don't have much. I want to help people reach for their dreams.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that making what seems like a small effort on my part can have a greater impact in the lives of others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with technology and financial services companies to test their new product or service ideas with the people or businesses that might eventually want to buy them. We tell them if an idea is good or not, and how it can be improved so it is most appealing to the people they want to pay for it.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world achieve their goals, but with a sense that they made the money rather than taking it from someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in an International School in Moscow, Russia (Москва, Россия)!!

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I like to see people create new answers to needs others have.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have trouble trusting to learn to get along better with others.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I have a small business of my own and have experienced nothing but success. I want to share that.
lender.occupational_info: I install and care for ornamental gardens.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: because it feels good.

lender.name: Steve and Michele
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given much is expected", and it's just the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: there's nothing more important or satisfying than helping another person.
lender.occupational_info: I help the government prepare for and respond to disasters.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: helping people to help themselves is very rewarding. I have a blessed life and want to make others feel that way about their lives. Pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: Manage a team in a highspeed internet call center in TampaBay. Supporting highspeed internet connections and Voice over IP phone.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I know there are hard working people out there that need a helping hand.

lender.name: Gregorio
lender.loan_because: improve women's condition in the world
lender.occupational_info: I would like to do better than heal physical ailment.

lender.name: Mr. Lee and Students
lender.occupational_info: I teach students with special needs.

lender.name: Monrray
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate in life. I hope to help people who work hard to improve their lives.

lender.name: Maria Kristel
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do and it makes you feel so good!
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes and make dreams come true! :)

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: It only takes a few minutes to enable other people to grasp the opportunities of a lifetime. We live in such a rich and over-saturated world, that to share only a tiny part of our wealth is the very least any of us should do.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in surgery and accident and emergency medicine. I help to save lives and to improve people's health.

lender.name: Shweta
lender.loan_because:
Every person deserves an opportunity to rise above poverty. These are hard working people with a will but no means. I love the inspiring stories of hope and strength.
This is an amazing project that provides a platform for direct participation. I am thankful for the opportunity to help.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software.

lender.name: Lucabella
lender.loan_because: they inspire me.

lender.name: Margot
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference for others who don't have the opportunities I have enjoyed.
lender.occupational_info: Case Management of low income parents towards educational and financial self sufficiency goals, through a grant funded program at local community and technical college. Part time, I'm a vocal artist.

lender.name: Kerry-Anne
lender.loan_because: I have everything I need and want to help others get closer to that.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students with disabilities to find and develop their strengths. Animals are another passion of mine - they remind me of children!

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: I can and I should. I was born into a small and well-off tribe at the outskirts of civilization. To a small nation, Iceland. I have no idea as to why I am so blessed to be here amongst the world´s wealthiest few? But, I know this much: we are all born into this world the same and should deserve an equal chance in life. And if I can, remotely level the paying field for a few South of here, then maybe there is a chance we can change the world one Kiva loan at a time?
lender.occupational_info: I talk to computers, set-top boxes and television screens all day in an effort to make them understand one another. Some days are better than others!

lender.name: Paddy
lender.loan_because: great oaks from little acorns grow
lender.occupational_info: Boring work , but it pays my bills, So i am grateful that i can provide for my family and consider myself very fortunate that i have some money to lend those who need it more than i do.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I have so much and would like to give to someone who needs help to improve their life
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to young children in a local Hong Kong school

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: ...Let's help others to help themselves!

lender.name: Lauren & Trevor
lender.loan_because: we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: Lauren writes and works as an editor for a small book publisher. Trevor creates computer software that monitors water supplies.

lender.name: Peter and Kristen
lender.loan_because: It's a fun way to help people.

lender.name: Demi
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world. A difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell health insurance for people that are sick and need better care. Also to healthy people that may need cover in the future.

lender.name: Tasha
lender.loan_because: i like too help the needed.
lender.occupational_info: helpfull

lender.name: Mabellynn
lender.loan_because: Giving is a wondeful gift to help change someones life.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: The only way to destroy poverty is to fight it for oneself.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: it excites me to know that I can help in a tiny way. And I admire what the team at kiva.org have put together.
lender.occupational_info: I support business owners to use their time more purposefully.

lender.name: Rico
lender.loan_because: I am dedicated to the simple, joyful and rare belief that we are all responsible for each other.
lender.occupational_info: All uphill.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: We believe it is important to help others. We are using Kiva to teach our children about helping others and the world we all share.

lender.name: Cherylynn
lender.loan_because: We have so much and it takes so little to make a big difference to one person or family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Christian School mainly in the administration area but also with the children of the school.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Aleta
lender.loan_because: My blessings are many, it is my pleasure to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the real estate industry.

lender.name: Simon Mark
lender.loan_because: The Kiva platform makes it so easy to help, and so personal and direct. Like a lot of other people, I want to make a difference and to feel a tangible connection with the lives of friends on the other side of the world who are in very different circumstances
lender.occupational_info: I am a business executive in the technology industry. My role is to lead a global team that is focused on serving one of my firm's biggest worldwide clients, a major global bank. So, I am responsible for the relationship between my firm and the client.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of markets and entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: Provide businesses with electricity generated from alternative energy

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: it inspires me.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses train, motivate, and keep good relationships with their employees so the whole business succeeds together.

lender.name: hannah
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give money to those in need.

lender.name: Bea
lender.loan_because: by giving, I gain more than I lend!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I've been very, very fortunate and not needed a lot of assistance. Others are not so fortunate so I need to help when and where possible.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computers and network for a School of Pharmacy at a state University.

lender.name: ibanezplayer
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit that lives within people. If everyone who had an idea for a business, had the guts to dive in, and had the self-motivation to make it happen was given access to the funds he/she needed, we could eliminate poverty. Poverty sucks. That's why I lend.
lender.occupational_info: Plan, implement, control, repeat.

lender.name: Jeffery
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Math/Science Teacher

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: Time has come for me to help others spread their wings.
